item.title: Nvidia namechecks Michael Burry in secret memo pushing back on AI bubble allegations
item.description: The chipmaker quietly circulated a private memo to analysts that explicitly namechecked investor Michael Burry and pushed back on many of his claims.

item.title: Michael Burry's next 'Big Short': An inside look at his analysis showing AI is a bubble
item.description: The investment world is "expecting far more economic importance out of this technology than is likely to be provided," Burry's associate portfolio man...

item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in premarket trading.

item.title: BlackRock's iShares bitcoin fund sees record exodus as crypto heads for worst month since 2022
item.description: Blackrock's spot bitcoin ETF has so far seen $2.2 billion worth of outflows in November as its underlying crypto continues to crater.
